comment: This class is for adult STEM students who are capable of reading a chapter or two per week on Feminist theory. Not meant for children with thin skin and XVII century political views. Easiest humanities class ever. Get ready to critically analyze STEM and learn a thing or two about science done by people who aren't male and white.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read

comment: Siobhan's class is awesome! She's very helpful and stays posted up at Starbucks in Social Science before class if you have any questions or concerns. I would definitely recommend this this class. I learned a lot from this class, you just have to go in open minded.

She doesn't force you to change your beliefs because she doesn't want to preach her own opinion but she does present you with opposing views and allows you to have an opinion. Don't be afraid of her naturally sarcastic tone. She also cusses so don't freak out. Only 2 major assignments and 4 journal entries with articles every night. Not hard at all

I took her gwst1102 class, and did not like it. I dropped her class before midterms. She gives long articles to read sometimes two each class. You have to come to class with the articles, if you don't and she does a spot check you get a 0. Also, she did not clarify what details to know, and has a sarcastic tone when you ask questions.

Siobhan is a great teacher if you enjoy Gender and Women's Studies because if you don't then you'll be bored. Long readings twice a week with very short easy quiz on them. One mid semester assessment, easy if you pay attention and read. One paper as final. Not a super easy class. Must work for your grade. Totally worth it if you work for it. Loved!

Siobhan is very passionate about the topics she teaches. She gives lots of readings and then pop quizzes on those readings. She usually lectures for a long time but also loves feedback and opinions of others. You have to submit 4 summaries on any 4 of the readings. There is 1 test at on keywords and then a final paper.  She is really hilarious too.

Her lectures are engaging and she loves class feedback - she will honestly get upset if people are not participating. Her grading is meticulous but the assignments are easy and assigned way in advance of the due dates. She is young and funny, understands students have a life outside the classroom. Doesnt make you buy text books - all online!

Things I dislike about this professor: Boring, Rude, Mean, Curses a LOT, too hard for an entry level class. quizzes every class & long readings. I would NEVER take a gender women's studies class again in my life. I took it as an elective and i regret it 100%. If you want to keep your sanity, GPA up, and not go to jail, lol - do NOT take her.

Siobhan is a great professor! I have no idea why anyone would give them a bad rate. Siobhan is very intelligent and well-versed in gender studies; They assign fun readings for the class. Sure, there's a pop quiz in almost every class, but if you're playing with a full deck, they're not hard. I loved Siobhan & I would take that class again & again.

HONEST TO GOD. DONT TAKE THIS PROF. gives u a quiz EVERY class within first 5 mins. so if ur late, 0. Must be present EVERY class. Class is SO boring, she gives u these 15pg long BORING articles tht u hv to read EVERY night b4 class. She talks way too much abt nothing. I regret takn her frm the bottom of my heart. Whatever you do-say NO to SIOBHAN!
